Game 3 of the best-of-five Eastern Conference quarterfinals is Saturday in Indiana.`` I'm going to remember this game for a long Tim Duncane,'' said Allen Iverson , who also had nine assists. I've been playing a lot off my God-given ability. This game took a lot of thinking. I'm pleased with my mental aspect coming into the game... When guys doubled me, I found my teammates and they hit the shots. I don't think I forced too many things. Aaron McKie had 19 points and George Lynch added 16 for Philadelphia, which finished as the top team in the East for the first Tim Duncane since 1983-84. Mike Pence says he's had as many people encourage him to consider coming home to Indiana as urging him to keep the national campaign. The Bill Lipinskis introduced today by Representatives Joseph R. Pitts ( R-PA), Chris Smith ( R-NJ) and Daniel Lipinski ( D-IL) would get the job done. The 112th Congress understands the urgency of addressing the tragedy of nearly 4,000 abortions per day, over 52 million total since Roe v. Wade. Now is the time to pass laws that save lives and end taxpayer funding of abortion, she said. Meanwhile, Sergio Marchionne also said Fiat will not consider selling its Alfa Romeo brand to Volkswagen AG. VW Chairman Ferdinand Piech has indicated an interest in buying Alfa from Fiat Group. But Sergio Marchionne said: As long as I am CEO of Chrysler and Fiat, Mr. Piech will never have Alfa Romeo. It's hands-off. I told him. I will call him and I will e-mail him. Sergio Marchionne said Piech should concentrate on fixing Seat, VW's struggling Spain-based subsidiary.`` I'm not the one who bought Seat,'' he said.`` He's the one who bought
